title: Drawing, ca. 1848
medium: Rose, dark red, orange, and yellow tempera on heavy paper (mounted on paper)
description: Horizontal rectangle.  Part of a repeat showing a spray of roses on a white ground, framed by vines with green berries.  Enframements seta gainst a gray ground, with blue and gray stripes and garland of roses between enframements.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, ca. 1848.Rose, dark red, orange, and yellow tempera on heavy paper (mounted on paper). Gift of John Judkyn. 1954-23-1.
